Text: Thanks again STF for another great book!

Even better than I remembered.
Barreto's art was very good.

As Roland the gunslinger from The Dark Tower might say:  Thankee sai

I suppose it's your Ka-Tet to continue to ul!  ;-)

you're all welcome. don't think it's my ka-tet, although it may in fact be a form of internet addiction. and even though i already have private insurance, perhaps obamacare will in fact cover my TPB withdrawal meds?

Awesome !! ... another Batsy stuff.
I mean i don't get it , what's with all the hype about iron man , whether its the movies or comics.
I totally dislike Iron Man , 
he is boring , 
looks like an uncle in that french cut beard.
& i hate his stupid iron armour, as in a cartoon show i  found him suffocating in the armour after he crashed from a blow. . . and all the rest of the marvel superheroes were saying - quick , he needs air , remove his iron mask. lol


Batman is way cooler and more smart too. lol
